rules.content: No Advertising in chat or in PM/DM.
No spammy messages, that means don't take several lines to not say much, and don't say the same thing over and over.
No commands outside of #bot-spam unless relevant to a conversation. `t!profile` is a good example as a chat friendly command, music commands are not.
If your username can't be easily mentioned, please set your nickname to something mentionable.
Don't set your name/nickname to `@everyone` or `@here`.
Respect all users especially the staff, if you're told to stop, then stop.
**Trigger the automod four times in five minutes and __you will be muted for one hour__** **(class II)**
**Do not argue with staff as their decisions are final.**

classes.name: Class II
classes.content: Logged mute *(length depends on staff decision)*

classes.name: Class IV
classes.content: Permanent ban *(All bans are by Account and IP courtesy of Discord)*

classes.name: Staff Decided
classes.content: Decided by a valid Staff Member
